tool_description: JavaScriptで動作する地図または取得した地図画像をWebサービス等で利用することができます。　Get a JavaScript file or map as an image on web pages.
name: NAVITIME Maps
title: NAVITIME Maps

api_list.name: map_script
api_list.description: Get a JavaScript file to control the tile map that runs on the browser.

required_parameters.name: host
required_parameters.description: A domain name of your website.

api_list.name: map_image(GET)
api_list.description: Get a static map image of the location, range and zoom value specified in the parameter.

required_parameters.name: width
required_parameters.description:
Width of the map.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 999)

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description:
Height of the map.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 999)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)
